radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild dependent atelectatic changes in the included portions of the lung bases; calcified granuloma in the left lower lobe; inflammation, wall thickening, and inflammatory fat stranding at the proximal-to-mid sigmoid colon consistent with perforation; extraluminal air consistent with perforation; no drainable fluid collection; hypodensity in the left kidney likely representing a simple cyst. No free air, free fluid, or lymphadenopathy.
